attributes.action: cease giving cash benefits to people and ereplace it with a token system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should cease providing those on benefits with cash. A token system should be introduced whereby they can exchanged for food and drink only at supermarkets/shops. It should not be possible to purchase alcohol or tobacco with them. There is no issue of pride, these people are living of the benefits that we give them, they should be grateful.
The people of this country are fed up with reading about people who earn tens of thousands of pounds a year for simply staying home and 'popping' kids out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
